description: Miss Providence has worked at several accounting firms in the Caribbean. In 2021, her role as a MVC ASP.NET Intern Website Developer was enlightening. Miss Providence uses her spare time to build open source GitHub projects using newly learnt programming languages - recenGolang, Angular, Nodejs, react native applications.
